actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other have thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged.

official_title: A joint resolution to urge the Committees on the Budget of both the Senate and the House of Representatives to strive to the maximum to apply the freeze concept across the board during the upcoming budgetary process.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the Congress to urge the Committees on the Budget of both the Senate and the House to strive to the maximum to apply the freeze concept across-the-board during the upcoming budgetary process.

titles.title: A joint resolution to urge the Committees on the Budget of both the Senate and the House of Representatives to strive to the maximum to apply the freeze concept across the board during the upcoming budgetary process.
